page.title: 11HOLT COUNTRY PARK.
page.content: THE COUNTRY PARK HAS AN{AREA OF 100 {ACRES.}THE 3 USES OF THE PARK ARE RECREATION, CONSERVATION AND FORESTRY. LOTS OF PEOPLE USE IT ESPECIALLY ON SUNDAYS. IT HAS BEEN GOING FOR 5 YEARS. THERE HAVE BEEN LOTS OF PROBLEMS SUCH AS VANDALISM AND PEOPLE ON MOTORBIKES. THE PARK WAS BOUGHT BY THE COUNCIL FOR{Â£30,000.}THEY ARE MAKING A NEW POND WHICH IS GOING TO BE {1.5 M DEEP.}THEY NEEDED{120 TONS OF {CLAY}TO COVER THE BOTTOM OF THE POND. THERE'S ONLY 1 NEW PLAN AND THAT IS FOR A CLASSROOM AND AN OFFICE. THERE ARE GOING TO BE SOME NEW HOUSES BUILT ON THE EDGE OF THE PARK SO THERE MIGHT BE THE PROBLEM OF RUBBISH BEING THROWN INTO THE PARK.THERE IS A WAYFARING COURSE WHICH HAS 4 COLOURS YELLOW, ORANGE, RED AND BLUE. QUITE A FEW{FORIEGN PEOPLE}HAVE BEEN TO THE PARK.
